section.name: Contributions
section.p: The following companies have made generous donations of software licenses for their products, time and resources, furthering the development of Rio.
Asarian supports our efforts by providing innovative contributions to the project.
Donated license for the great IDE IntelliJ IDEA

YourKit is kindly supporting open source projects with its full-featured Java Profiler. YourKit, LLC is the creator of innovative and intelligent tools for profiling Java and .NET applications. Take a look at YourKit's leading software products: YourKit Java Profiler and YourKit .NET Profiler
